definition: propitious day/lucky day
lucky/giga- (meaning billion or 10^9)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month
fine time, lucky day (idiom); fig. good opportunity

sentences.english: At present, the auspicious days there are many ways a really good time.
sentences.chinese: 目前，選擇吉日良辰的方法有很多。

sentences.english: Think which day dry, is a lucky day that day.
sentences.chinese: 想哪天干，那天就是吉日。
恭喜恭喜，今天可是個良辰吉日啊。

sentences.english: Finally, the deceased emperor was buried in the imperial mausoleum on a selected day.
sentences.chinese: 最後，皇帝會在一個黃道吉日安葬在皇陵。

sentences.english: Well, will there are any sunday in June which fall on a chinese auspicious day?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，六月有沒有良辰吉日的星期天呢？

sentences.english: It will be an auspicious day for Libra men.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座男人的黃道吉日。

sentences.english: Chinese couples consulted a special book to find lucky and unlucky days.
sentences.chinese: 中國的新娘新郎翻閱通聖，查找吉日和凶日。

sentences.english: Because the lunar calendar says today is auspicious.
sentences.chinese: 因爲農曆上說今天是黃道吉日啊。

sentences.english: The almanac says that today is a suitable day for going out.
sentences.chinese: 通書上說今天是個吉日，宜出行。

sentences.english: Well, will there be any Sunday in June which falls on a Chinese auspicious day?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，六月有沒有良辰吉日的星期天呢？

sentences.english: They have already chosen a lucky day to get married.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經選好了吉日，準備結婚。

sentences.english: There are 2 numbers to explore the signs of Aquarius as happy lucky days for each month.
sentences.chinese: 關於水瓶座在每個月份的吉日，有兩個數字能夠說明。

sentences.english: On auspicious-day he would led this monkey army, a million strong.
sentences.chinese: 他要選擇一個黃道吉日，率領這支百萬猴軍。

sentences.english: Lots of chinese people will choose the auspicious day of getting married according to a lunar calendar.
sentences.chinese: 許多中國人會根據陰曆來選擇結婚的黃道吉日。

sentences.english: The celebration party will be held on an day to celebrate the of their efforts.
sentences.chinese: 慶功宴會選在吉日舉行，以慶祝他們努力的成果。

sentences.english: Press the truth, home someone died, should choose a lucky day report to lose.
sentences.chinese: 按道理，家裏有人去世了，是應該選吉日報喪的。

definition: fine time, lucky day (idiom); fig. good opportunity
to select
marriage
birthday
casting a couple's fortune based on their bithdates (old)
to fix a date (for an event)/to select an auspicious date
to pick an auspicious day
wedding day
Chinese divination almanac
the traditional Chinese calendar/the lunar calendar
to send the betrothal gifts/(fig.) to conclude a marriage
lunar calendar
to move (to a superior place)/promotion
9-11 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
to break ground (prior to building sth)/to start building
first month of the lunar year
